description: This file contains data class definitions modeling various entities within a food delivery app, such as Restaurant, MenuCategory, MenuItem, and configuration classes for options and cart lines. It also includes utility functions for computing option price deltas and building configuration summaries.

classes.name: Restaurant
classes.description: Represents a restaurant shown on the Home screen, including details like name, cuisine tags, rating, eta, banner color, and optional image URL.

classes.name: MenuCategory
classes.description: Represents a category within a restaurant's menu, identified by id and title.

classes.name: OptionItem
classes.description: A selectable option belonging to a VariantGroup or AddOnGroup, with a price delta.

classes.name: VariantGroup
classes.description: A single-select group of options such as size or spice level, indicating whether selection is required.

classes.name: AddOnGroup
classes.description: A multi-select group of options such as extras or additional items, with optional min and max selection constraints.

classes.name: MenuItem
classes.description: A menu item available for ordering, including associated variant and add-on groups, images, description, and pricing details.

classes.name: ItemConfiguration
classes.description: Configuration for a cart line, including selected variant options and add-ons, with a method for generating a stable key.

classes.name: CartLine
classes.description: Represents a line in the shopping cart, combining a MenuItem with a specific configuration and quantity.

methods.name: computeOptionsDeltaCents
methods.description: Calculates the total price delta (in cents) for selected options within a menu item configuration, summing variant and add-on deltas.

methods.name: buildConfigurationSummary
methods.description: Builds a human-readable string summarizing the selected variants and add-ons for display in the cart UI.
